page.title: 06Round Pond Nurseries Chobham
page.content: Mr.E.Edwards is the manager,he has worked there for 22 years. Mr. W. Atkins owns the{nursery}which is part of Chobham Pond Estate,it has been open for 90 years, it has{26 employees and is spread over an areas of{22 {acres.}They grow all their{plants}from {cuttings,}everything is started off in pots. It is a{wholesale nursery,}they have 800 people who trade with them. They go to seven shows a year to advertise, it is a very profitable job. They grow{rare plants,}their main crop is{Azalias.}They spray their plants with{30 different sprays}to get rid of fungi,greenfly and other {pests.}They pot 11,000 plants in 7 hours. Work starts at 8.00am and finishes at 5.00pm. They have a sterilised{laboratory.}There are more nurseries in Chobham than anywhere else in the country.
